question.xref: DES s7, DES s10, HC r215
question.text: How should you overtake horse riders?

explanation.text: When you’re on country roads be aware of particular dangers. Be prepared for farm animals, horses, pedestrians, farm vehicles and wild animals. Always be prepared to slow down or stop.

answer.text: Drive up close and overtake as soon as possible
Speed is not important but allow plenty of room
Use your horn just once to warn them
Drive slowly and leave plenty of room
